Package it.seba.juno.model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
it.seba.juno.util.Observable
it.seba.juno.model.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Observable
The model for the game, manage whole match.
Author:
Sebastian Rapetti

  • Constructor Details

    • GameModel

      public GameModel(OptionsModel optionsModel)
      Class Constructor.
      Parameters:
      optionsModel - The option model, contains the data about options.

  • Method Details

    • currentFirstTopCardWild

      public boolean currentFirstTopCardWild()
      Checks if the card in discard pile when the game starts is a wild card. Used to force the current player to chose the color for the discard pile.
      Returns:
      True if card is a wild card, false otherwise.

    • currentPlayerCannotDrop

      public boolean currentPlayerCannotDrop()
      Checks if the next player cannot drop a card because he has no compatible cards. Used by the both controller and view to enable the deck button for the human player.
      Returns:
      True if cannot drop, false otherwise.

    • currentTopCardDrawTwo

      public boolean currentTopCardDrawTwo()
      Checks if the current card in discard pile is a draw two card. Used to force the current player to draw two cards.
      Returns:
      True if card is a draw two card, false otherwise.

    • currentTopCardReverse

      public boolean currentTopCardReverse()
      Checks if the current card in discard pile is a reverse card. Used to change order of play.
      Returns:
      True if card is a reverse card, false otherwise.

    • currentTopCardSkip

      public boolean currentTopCardSkip()
      Checks if the current card in discard pile is a skip card. Used to force the current player to skip the turn.
      Returns:
      True if card is a skip card, false otherwise.

    • currentTopCardWildDrawFour

      public boolean currentTopCardWildDrawFour()
      Checks if the current card in discard pile is a draw four card. Used to force the current player to draw two cards.
      Returns:
      True if card is a draw four card, false otherwise.

    • dealCard

      public UnoCard dealCard()
      Deal a card from the deck.
      Returns:
      The card as UnoCard object.

    • dealCardsToPlayers

      public void dealCardsToPlayers()
      Deal cards to players, used when the game starts.

    • discardPileColor

      public UnoColor discardPileColor()
      Returns the discard pile color.
      Returns:
      The color as UnoColor object.

    • discardPileTopCard

      public UnoCard discardPileTopCard()
      Return the discard pile top card.
      Returns:
      The card as UnoCard object.

    • drawOneCard

      public void drawOneCard()
      Move a card from the deck to the current player.

    • dropCardHuman

      public void dropCardHuman(UnoCard card)
      Drop card action performed by Human player.
      Parameters:
      card - The card dropped by the human player.

    • dropCardNpc

      public void dropCardNpc()
      Drop card action performed by npc player, the card is chose using strategies.

    • dropFirstCardToPileAction

      public void dropFirstCardToPileAction()
      The action of drop to discard pile the first card after the dealer dealt cards to players. If the first card is a wild draw four, the card returns to the deck.

    • droppable

      public boolean droppable(UnoCard card)
      Checks if a card is droppable to discard pile.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if card is compatible with discard pile, false otherwise.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns the current player of the match.
      Returns:
      current Player as Player object.

    • getDealer

      public int getDealer()
      Returns the current dealer.
      Returns:
      The dealer as player index.

    • getNextPlayer

      public Player getNextPlayer()
      Returns the next player of the match.
      Returns:
      Next player as Player object.

    • getOrderOfPlay

      public boolean getOrderOfPlay()
      Returns the order of play for the match.
      Returns:
      True if clockwise, false anticlockwise.

    • getPlayers

      public UnoPlayers getPlayers()
      Returns the players of the match.
      Returns:
      Players as UnoPlayers object

    • humanDroppedChangeColorCard

      public boolean humanDroppedChangeColorCard()
      Checks if the human player dropped a card that permit to change the discard pile color.
      Returns:
      True if yes, false otherwise.

    • isChangeColor

      public boolean isChangeColor()
      Check if there is a change in discard pile color.
      Returns:
      True if yes, false otherwise.

    • isDrawn

      public boolean isDrawn()
      Check if the current user drawn a card from the deck.
      Returns:
      True if yes, false otherwise.

    • isDropped

      public boolean isDropped()
      Check if the current player dropped a card.
      Returns:
      True if yes, false otherwise.

    • isFirst

      public boolean isFirst()
      Returns if the match turn is the first of the match, the turn after card dealing.
      Returns:
      True if yes, false otherwise.

    • isOneCard

      public boolean isOneCard()
      Check if the player has only one card.
      Returns:
      True if the player has only one card, false otherwise.

    • isWinner

      public boolean isWinner()
      Check if the player is the winner.
      Returns:
      True if the player is the winner, false otherwise.

    • needReset

      public boolean needReset()
      Check if the number of players in game options changed.
      Returns:
      True if yes, false otherwise.

    • next

      public void next()
      Set the model to the next player that have to move.

    • nextPlayerCannotDrop

      public boolean nextPlayerCannotDrop()
      Checks if the next player cannot drop a card because he has no compatible cards. Used by the view to enable the deck button for the human player.
      Returns:
      True if cannot drop, false otherwise.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Initialize or reinitialize the model for a new game.

    • setDiscardPileColor

      public void setDiscardPileColor(UnoColor color)
      Change the discard pile color.
      Parameters:
      color - The new color of the discard pile.

    • setNumberOfPlayers

      public void setNumberOfPlayers()
      Generate players for the match, this method does not have parameters because the number of players is decided at game options level.
